name: sample packaging
description: A step involving the packaging of samples for transport or storage.
icon.name: sheet-plastic

name: freeze drying
description: A step involving the removal of moisture from samples by sublimation.
icon.name: snowflake

name: labelling
description: A step involving the application of labels to organisms, samples or containers.
icon.name: tag

name: scan qrcode
description: A step involving the scanning of a QR code for identification or tracking purposes.
icon.name: qrcode

name: photographing
description: A step involving the capture of images of organisms, samples or containers.
icon.name: camera

name: geotagging
description: A step involving the recording of geographical coordinates for samples or organisms.
icon.name: map-location-dot
